name: Medieval Battlefields - Black Edition
description: Dive into the chivalric but unforgiving period of human history - conquer Europe in Medieval Battlefields!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128 MB 3D video card (256 MB recommend) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Its a fun little game and I have enjoyed playing it.
